artist: John Raphael Smith, James Barry, John Boydell
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

in plate below image in black: [J. Barry pinxit/ Mercuri facunde nepos Atlantis/ Oui feros cultus hominum recentum/ voce formasti catos, et decorae/ MERCURY INVENTING THE LYRE/ Published Feb. 1st 1775 by John Boydell, Engraver in Cheapside, London/ More Plaustre:/ Te canam, magni Fovis et Deorum/ Nuntium, curvaeque lyrae parentim; Horace lib I ode X/ J. R. Smith fecit]; below image in margin in pencil: [1-82]
title: Mercury Inventing the Lyre
